wikipedia_page.main: Ian Candlish Kirkwood, Lord Kirkwood (8 June 1932 – 22 April 2017) QC was a Senator of the College of Justice of the Supreme Courts of Scotland. He was appointed to the Inner House (Scotland's main appellate court) in 1987.

response: *  1932   – Ian Kirkwood, Lord Kirkwood, Scottish lawyer and judge (d. 2017)
